title: FS: Group of 6 Low Grade 1912 C46 Imperial Tobacco Cards

posts.post_title: FS: Group of 6 Low Grade 1912 C46 Imperial Tobacco Cards
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of C46 Imperial Tobacco cards for sale. These are all very low grade/filler cards as the photos will show.

CARDS LISTED:

#4 White - $20
#6 Ward - $15
#29 Schirm - $20
#71 Lee - $15
#81 Spencer - $15
#83 Shaw - $20

Please add $3 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
